General.Name: Quoin Pharmaceuticals Ltd DRC
General.Description: Quoin Pharmaceuticals, Ltd., a late stage specialty pharmaceutical company, focuses on the development and commercialization of therapeutic products for rare and orphan diseases in the United States. The company's lead product is QRX003, a topical lotion to treat Netherton Syndrome (NS). It also developing QRX004 for the treatment of recessive dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa; QRX007 to treat Netherton Syndrome; and QRX008 for the treatment of scleroderma. It has a research agreement with Queensland University of Technology; a license agreement with Skinvisible Inc.; consulting agreements with Axella Research LLC; and a Master Service Agreement with Therapeutics Inc. Quoin Pharmaceuticals, Ltd. was founded in 2018 and is based in Ashburn, Virginia. Quoin Pharmaceuticals, Ltd. is a subsidiary of Skinvisible, Inc.
General.Address: 42127 Pleasant Forest Court, Ashburn, VA, United States, 20148-7349
